ComicInfo.Summary:
KISS Comics are back! Dynamite proudly continues to present the best, because you continue to want the best… KISS in “Phantom Obsession”!
The band have found themselves wined, dined and detained by the genius Darius Cho! As Cho puts each member through the wringer, a new-found ally may be able to help the Masters of all things Rock and/or Roll get the upper hand on Cho and his army of pop-culture-inspired destruction!
Featuring the most metal of heavy metal covers by Jae Lee Stuart Sayger, Tim Seeley, series artist Celor and a special photo cover featuring the one-and-only legends of Rock and/or Roll – KISS!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Jae Lee (a) & June Chung (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Stuart Sayger | 2 | C | Cover C | Tim Seeley | 3 | D | Cover D | Celor | 4 | E | Cover E | Photo | 5 | F/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Line Art" Edition Variant Cover | Jae Lee | 6 | G/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Line Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 7 | H/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Line Art" Edition Variant Cover | Jae Lee | 8 | I/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Line Art" Edition Variant Cover | Tim Seeley | 9 | J/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Jae Lee (a) & June Chung (c) | 10 | K/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 11 | L/Var | Premium Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 12 | M/FOC | 1:7 FOC Retailer Incentive "Virgin Photo" Edition Variant Cover | Photo | 13 | N/FOC | 1:11 FOC Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Tim Seeley | 14 | O/FOC | 1:21 FOC Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 15 |
